title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 December 2012 - XWiki

17:11 <sdumitriu> Any idea why there's no mailserver configured on myxwiki.org?  
17:11 <sdumitriu> Is it on purpose, to avoid spam, or just that nobody thought of doing it?  
17:16 <vmassol> hmm there should be one since I receive emails from it  
17:16 <vmassol> (for my watchlists)
